text: Definitely.  I’d love to see it.  I’d really recommend you join the facebook group and hang out there. You can just listen at first if you’re a bit nervous of getting involved, but it’s very friendly. <https://www.facebook.com/groups/awuk.ed/>

attachments.title: AWUK-Education
attachments.text: A big hello & welcome to Animated Women UK Education! AWUK-Ed supports women, trans and non-binary people studying Animation & VFX subjects. The AWUK mission is to inspire change through Networking,...

text: also there are some good resources on our site here <http://www.animatedwomenuk.com/awuk-ed/>

attachments.title: Animated Women UK Supporting Women in VFX & Animation
attachments.text: Our Vision is to see a change in the UK's animation and VFX industries. We want to support a network of women who can help each other achieve success at every stage of the animation or VFX pipeline.
attachments.fallback: Animated Women UK: Animated Women UK Supporting Women in VFX & Animation
